title: Little River Canyon National Preserve: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Pets              Pets       Pets are welcome at Little River Canyon National Preserve. We understand that your pet is part of your family and you would like to bring them on trips with you. We want you, your pet and other visitors to be safe while enjoying the outdoors at the Preserve. When you decide to bring your pet to Little River Canyon National Preserve please adhere to the following rules:  Pets must be kept on a leash at all times. Pets must never be left unattended. Pet owners are responsible for cleaning up and disposing of pet feces in a park trash can or otherwise removed from the park.
